special_powers.name: INTERDIMENSIONAL COUNCIL OF REEDS
special_powers.description: Leadership. When Reed Richards Alpha uses it, give Reed Richards Alpha a number of Bridge tokens equal to half the result of his roll. // FREE: Remove 6 Bridge tokens to generate a Reed Council Member bystander.

special_powers.name: A MULTIVERSE'S WORTH OF REED'S INVENTIONS
special_powers.description: When Reed Richards Alpha generates a Reed Council Member bystander, choose a standard attack or damage power and note it. Reed Richards Alpha and Reed Council Member bystanders can use all powers noted in this way.

special_powers.name: FALL OF THE COUNCIL
special_powers.description: When a Reed Council Member bystander is KO'd, deal Reed Richards Alpha 1 unavoidable damage and an opponent chooses a noted power. The chosen power is no longer "noted" (that power may not be used in this way until "noted" again). Protected: Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: Y'KNOW...I'VE HAD JUST ABOUT ENOUGH OF YOU!
special_powers.description: Force Blast, Hypersonic Speed. When Invisible Woman knocks a character back and their knock back path is blocked, after resolutions deal that character 1 penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: BEING CAPTAIN UNIVERSE IS FINE, BUT I'M STILL SUE
special_powers.description: STOP. Invisible Woman can't be healed. // Barrier. Barrier as FREE, but only to generate 2 markers.

special_powers.name: THE UNI-POWER'S BONDING WITH YOU
special_powers.description: Perplex. // When this power is first revealed, choose another friendly character that shares a keyword. This game, the chosen character modifies all combat values +1 and has Cosmic Energy team ability, Improved Targeting: Hindering, Destroy Blocking, Adjacent.

special_powers.name: RECLAIMING POWER FROM THE OTHER FANTASTIC FOUR
special_powers.description: When The Thing uses Fantastic Four team ability to heal, he heals 2 clicks instead. Otherwise, The Thing can't heal.

special_powers.name: CLOBBERIN' TIME IN STEREO
special_powers.description: Poison, Super Strength. // If another friendly character named The Thing hit this turn, The Thing can use Flurry.

special_powers.name: IGNEOUS SKIN
special_powers.description: STOP. Toughness.

special_powers.name: DULY APPOINTED MIDDLEMAN OF YOUR PEOPLE AND THE GREAT CITY OF NEW YORK
special_powers.description: When establishing themed teams, characters on your starting force with the Inhumans keyword gain the Fantastic Four keyword and have Fantastic Four team ability.

special_powers.name: I DON'T LEAVE FRIENDS BEHIND
special_powers.description: Passenger: 2, but only to carry characters that share a keyword. When carrying a character that shares a keyword, Human Torch doesn't modify his speed.

special_powers.name: THIS IS FAMILY STUFF...YOU DON'T WANT TO GET IN THE MIDDLE OF IT
special_powers.description: Leadership. When Human Torch uses it and removes an action token from a friendly character, choose one: *Remove an additional action from that character. *The character has SAFEGUARD: Energy Explosion, Pulse Wave until your next turn.

special_powers.name: REPULSOR REFLECT
special_powers.description: FREE: Remove a d6 from this card. Giant Reach: X this turn, where X is the result of that d6.

special_powers.name: THIS IS NO ORDINARY WEAPON, LACKEY. IT IS...EXCALIBUR!
special_powers.description: Blades/Claws/Fangs, Super Senses. If there is no d6 on this card when Dr. Doom uses either power, after resolutions you may place the result of that d6 on this card. // When Dr. Doom uses Blades/Claws/Fangs or Super Senses, once per turn you may replace the die in the result for the d6 roll with the d6 on this card.

special_powers.name: THE EXCALIBUR SHARD, FUSED WITH MY ARMOR!
special_powers.description: Invincible. When Dr. Doom clears (at least 1 action token), you may remove the die on this card to heal him 1 click. Protected: Outwit.

special_powers.name: I BURN PIECE BY PIECE
special_powers.description: Silver Surfer starts the game with 4 Light tokens. // FREE: Remove a Light token. If you do, this turn Silver Surfer can use Pulse Wave and KNOCKBACK and, when he uses KNOCKBACK, he may place them up to 6 squares away instead of 3.

special_powers.name: A SILVER BLADE OF COSMIC POWER
special_powers.description: Blades/Claws/Fangs, Giant Reach: 3. // When Silver Surfer makes a close attack, you may remove a Light token. If you do, opposing characters can't use Probability Control and can't reduce damage below 1 for this attack.

special_powers.name: I RETURN...IN THE BLACK
special_powers.description: STOP. Super Senses. Silver Surfer can't be healed. // When this power is first revealed, remove all Light tokens and heal another friendly character that many clicks.

special_powers.name: MASS TELEPORTATION
special_powers.description: Passenger: 1. Passenger: 4, but only to carry characters that share a keyword.

special_powers.name: LOYAL COMPANION, FIERCE PROTECTOR
special_powers.description: Friendly adjacent characters that share a keyword can use Mastermind, but only to choose Lockjaw.

special_powers.name: HE WON'T LET GO!
special_powers.description: When Lockjaw attacks, missed targets gain Immobile until your next turn.

special_powers.name: SWORD PORTALS
special_powers.description: Blades/Claws/Fangs. When Red Shift uses it, after resolutions you may place a hit character up to X squares away from their current square where X is the d6 result.

special_powers.name: SUBTERRANEAN INVASION
special_powers.description: Passenger: 6, but only to carry characters with the Monster keyword, regardless of size.

special_powers.name: MOLOID PILE
special_powers.description: Mole Man has a range of 6 and 2 targets. // Incapacitate. When Mole Man uses it, after resolutions deal 1 penetrating damage to each hit character that was given an action token.

special_powers.name: LAST REMAINING LIFE-SPARK TRANSFERRED TO AN ANDROID BODY
special_powers.description: The first time Air-Walker would be KO'd, instead turn him to click #1 and place him in your starting area. Protected: Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: THE WORLD SHALL KNOW THE MIGHT OF DR. DOOM!
special_powers.description: When Dr. Doom hits, after resolutions generate a Doombot bystander [MAX 3].

special_powers.name: YOU WILL FALL BENEATH MY LEGION OF DOOMBOTS!
special_powers.description: Dr. Doom modifies his attack and defense by +X where X is equal to the number of his Doombot bystanders on the map. // Dr. Doom gains an additional [BOLT] if 2 or more of his Doombot bystanders are on the map.

special_powers.name: FOOLS! THAT WAS NOT THE REAL DOOM!
special_powers.description: FREE: KO one of Dr. Doom's Doombot bystanders. If you did, place Dr. Doom in the square they last occupied and heal him a number of clicks equal to the number of his Doombot bystanders on your force.

special_powers.name: MECHANICAL MOSQUITOES
special_powers.description: FREE: Generate a Mosquito bystander [MAX 3].

special_powers.name: MIND-CONTROLLING MICROFIBER TATTOOS
special_powers.description: When Dr. Doom or a Mosquito bystander hits, give each hit opposing character a Tattoo token. // Dr. Doom modifies his attack by +X when targeting characters with a Tattoo token and modifies his defense by +X when attacked by a character with a Tattoo token where X is the number of characters with Tattoo tokens.

special_powers.name: HERALD OF GALACTUS
special_powers.description: Firelord has Cosmic Energy team ability.

special_powers.name: BORNE OF COSMIC FLAME
special_powers.description: Regeneration as FREE. // Once per game, FREE: Make an attack using Firelord's printed combat values.

special_powers.name: BEHOLD THE ULTIMATE POWER IN THE UNIVERSE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of your turn, roll a d6 and choose a number of Infinity Gem effect(s) equal to half the result from the list below that were not chosen last turn. Thanos can use the chosen effect(s) until your next turn. *POWER - Close Combat Expert, Range Combat Expert. *TIME - Probability Control, Super Senses. *REALITY - Barrier, Smoke Cloud. Thanos may use both as FREE, but only to generate 1 marker. *SOUL - Steal Energy, but with close and range attacks. Regeneration as FREE. *MIND - Mind Control as FREE. When Thanos uses it, he has Improved Targeting: Hindering, Elevated, Blocking, Characters, Adjacent. *SPACE - Phasing/Teleport. Phasing/Teleport as FREE, but only to move up to 6 squares.

special_powers.name: I AM A GOD
special_powers.description: Thanos has Cosmic Energy team ability. // Thanos can reduce penetrating damage.
